blogPost.excerpt: Worksphere is workplace management software for companies offering employees options to work in-office or remote. Worksphere automates desk booking, safe entry, and gives you office usage data to right-size your workplace.
blogPost.body: Worksphere is workplace management software for companies offering employees options to work in-office or remote. Worksphere automates desk booking, safe entry, and gives you office usage data to right-size your workplace.
blogPost.title: Worksphere - Software to manage your flexible workplace
blogPost.author: Lindsay Amos

localize.description: Worksphere是一款工作场所管理软件，为企业提供员工在办公室或远程工作的选择。Worksphere可以自动预约办公桌，安全输入，并为您提供办公室使用数据，以正确确定工作场所的规模。
localize.tagline: 管理灵活工作场所的软件

localize.description: Worksphere是一款工作場所管理軟件，爲企業提供員工在辦公室或遠程工作的選擇。Worksphere可以自動預約辦公桌，安全輸入，併爲您提供辦公室使用數據，以正確確定工作場所的規模。
localize.tagline: 管理靈活工作場所的軟件

previous.excerpt: PeachPay empowers creators and freelancers to convert their passion into income, and start accepting payment quickly through our simple and accelerated checkout method.
previous.title: PeachPay - Convert your passion into income

localize.description: PeachPay使创作者和自由职业者能够将他们的热情转化为收入，并通过我们简单和加速的结账方式快速接受付款。
localize.tagline: 将您的热情转化为收入

localize.description: PeachPay使創作者和自由職業者能夠將他們的熱情轉化爲收入，並通過我們簡單和加速的結賬方式快速接受付款。
localize.tagline: 將您的熱情轉化爲收入

next.excerpt: Workplace scores, by Blind. Take a brief survey to see culture & and sentiment ratings by verified employees. You can use Blind Pulse on the Blind app.
next.title: Blind Pulse - Workplace culture & sentiment ratings by verified employees

localize.description: 工作场所评分，由盲。通过简单的调查，查看经过验证的员工对企业文化和情感的评价。您可以在Blind应用上使用Blind Pulse。
localize.tagline: 经过验证的员工对工作场所文化和情绪的评价。

localize.description: 工作場所評分，由盲。通過簡單的調查，查看經過驗證的員工對企業文化和情感的評價。您可以在Blind應用上使用Blind Pulse。
localize.tagline: 經過驗證的員工對工作場所文化和情緒的評價。
